title: Tasker 6.0.1 beta brings Tasky improvements and a new Get Pixel Colors action
content:
After rolling out a new beginner-friendly UI called Tasky on the beta channel last week, Tasker developer Jo√£o Dias has now released another update on the beta channel. The new update brings some additional improvements for Tasky, along with a few new features for advanced users. According to the changelog shared on the Tasker subreddit,

The post Tasker 6.0.1 beta brings Tasky improvements and a new Get Pixel Colors action appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest beta update for popular automation app Tasker brings improvements for its beginner-friendly Tasky UI and a new Get Pixel Colors action.
